availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Sanford Anderson and Susan Anderson. Married to Mary P. Bailey Anderson in Bath County, Kentucky, on November 7, 1853. Father of Louisiana B. Anderson, Alvira Anderson, and William S. Anderson. Farmer in Bath County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, District 1, p. 66B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, p. 217.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, Wyoming, p. 127A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Bath County Marriages, Film #000273006, p. 246 (of microfilm), (Accessed via ancestry.com).
